column4: Business is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Community facility is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Home of student is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Hospital is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Library/media center is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Mobile is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
The type of location at which instruction or service takes place is in a category not yet defined in CEDS.
Other K-12 educational institution is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
Postsecondary facility is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
School is the type of location at which instruction or service takes place.
